data.title: The Best Oak Hill Academy Alumni
data.meta_description: Over 200 sports fans have voted on the 30+ athletes on Best Oak Hill Academy Alumni. Current Top 3: Carmelo Anthony, Kevin Durant, Rajon Rondo
data.text:
Ranked By

1.2K votes

284 voters

Voting Rules

Vote for your favorite Oak Hill Academy Alumni to make it to the NBA.

Who are the best oak hill academy basketball players of all time? Here's a list of famous Oak Hill Academy aluni who've made it to the NBA. These prominent graduates feature former Oak Hill basketball stars who are great basketball players. Established in Mouth of Wilson, VA, Oak Hill Academy boasts a strong basketball program with many alumni becoming NBA superstars. Including Golden State Warriors' Kevin Durant and Houston Rockets' Carmelo Anthony, this list of the best Oak Hill Academy alumni in the NBA features some of the best basketball players in the world.

Other notable alumni include Rajon Rondo, Ty Lawons, Michael Beasley, Brandon Jennings, Cole Anthony, and many more.

Vote up your favorite Oak Hill Academy NBA players. Then, check back later as this NBA factory school continues to crank out great players year in/year out.

Birthplace : Brooklyn, New York

Team : Los Angeles Lakers

Position : Small forward

One of the most dominant scorers in the history of the game, Carmelo Anthony's time at Oak Hill Academy was a clear precursor to the prolific scorer he would go on to become in the NBA. 'Melo', as he's affectionately known, has brought excitement and flair to every team he's played for - including the Denver Nuggets, New York Knicks, Oklahoma City Thunder, and Portland Trail Blazers - proving himself as not just a powerhouse scorer, but also a gifted passer and rebounder. His aggressive style of play and ability to create and exploit mismatches on offense have cemented his legacy as one of the best Oak Hill Academy products ever to grace the hardwood.

Birthplace : Washington, D.C.

Team : Brooklyn Nets

Position : Small forward

A master of maneuvering and seemingly unstoppable on the court, Durant's ability to score from virtually anywhere on the floor is what truly distinguishes him as one of the greatest Oak Hill Academy alumni of all time. While his storied career with the Oklahoma City Thunder, Golden State Warriors, and Brooklyn Nets might be what many think of first, it's important not to forget his time at Oak Hill, where he laid the groundwork for the incredible player he would become. His impact on the sport has been undeniable, both in terms of his on-court skill as well as his influence on other players who've looked to model their game after his own unique, versatile style.

Birthplace : Louisville, Kentucky

Team : Cleveland Cavaliers

Position : Point guard

As one of the premier point guards in the game, Rondo's time at Oak Hill Academy helped forge a path for his immensely successful NBA career, which has included stints with the Boston Celtics, New Orleans Pelicans, Los Angeles Lakers, and more. Known for his incredible court vision and basketball IQ, Rondo possesses a rare ability to control the flow of the game and rack up assists like few others can. His leadership and hard-nosed defensive style have made him a highly sought-after commodity throughout his career, and his impact on the sport can be clearly seen through the success of the teams he's played for.

Birthplace : Kinston, North Carolina, USA

Team : Atlanta Hawks

Position : Shooting guard, Small forward

Jerry Stackhouse took Oak Hill Academy by storm in the early 1990s, earning himself a spot among the elite players in the history of the prestigious program. As a dynamic scoring guard with a penchant for highlight-reel dunks, Stackhouse would go on to have an illustrious NBA career that spanned nearly two decades, making stops with the Detroit Pistons, Philadelphia 76ers, Dallas Mavericks, and beyond. His tenacious approach to the game and never-back-down attitude have made him a fan favorite and respected figure in basketball circles, both as a player and now as a coach in the collegiate ranks.

Birthplace : Compton, California

Team : Milwaukee Bucks, Detroit Pistons, Orlando Magic, New York Knicks, Washington Wizards

Position : Point guard

A lightning-quick point guard with incredible ball-handling skills, Brandon Jennings' time at Oak Hill Academy prepared him for an NBA career full of electrifying plays and jaw-dropping highlights. Known for his ability to break down defenders and dish out dazzling assists, Jennings brought excitement and flair to every team he suited up for, including the Milwaukee Bucks, Detroit Pistons, and Washington Wizards. Though his career has been somewhat overshadowed by injuries, Jennings' talent and influence on the sport remain a testament to his status as one of the best Oak Hill Academy products.

Birthplace : Cheverly, Maryland, USA

Team : Los Angeles Clippers

Position : Small forward, Power forward

An offensive powerhouse during his time at Oak Hill Academy, Michael Beasley's versatile scoring ability foreshadowed his eventual NBA success. With stints on multiple teams, including the Miami Heat, Minnesota Timberwolves, and New York Knicks, Beasley's contributions have been felt across the league, as his inside-out scoring ability and relentless work ethic put opposing defenses to the test. Although his career has had its ups and downs, there's no denying the talent and passion that Beasley brings to the game, making him one of Oak Hill's most notable alumni.
